original_text: All this trouble happened to Jerusalem and to Judah because the Lord was very angry with them. In the end, the Lord sent them away from himself.
korean_text: 여호와께서 예루살렘과 유다를 진노하심이 그들을 그 앞에서 쫓아내실 때까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: All this trouble happened to Jerusalem and to Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 재앙이 예루살렘과 유다에 닥쳤으니

sentences.original_text: because the Lord was very angry with them
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그들에게 심히 분노하셨기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: In the end, the Lord sent them away from himself
sentences.korean_translation: 마침내 주께서 그들을 자기 앞에서 쫓아내셨더라
